website_summaries.verdict: Another top-quality pick recognized for its waterproof technology and sleek design.
pros: Buyers rave over the blanket's 100% waterproof design – perfect for protecting furniture from pet messes
High-quality fabric holds up under indoor and outdoor use
cons: More expensive than other comparable products
Some buyers wish the blanket was thicker

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these blankets 3 weeks ago when we adopted a 13 week old puppy because I was worried that he would have accidents & wanted something to protect my couch. We haven’t had any accidents luckily but the puppy LOVES THIS BLANKET!!! He loves it so much I bought a 2nd one so he could have one at the office when he comes there with me. He lays on it, covers himself with it, drags it around, & is just crazy about it!!! Definitely a great buy!!!
customer_reviews.author: KtL816

customer_reviews.title: Best couch cover ever
customer_reviews.text: My dog has a spontaneous vomiting disorder. It's super - happens with no warning, sometimes even in her sleep. She's ruined EVERY pillow and couch cushion I own. I just bought a new couch and had been using geriatric bed pads to protect it, but then got this blanket. It's SO soft and happens to match perfectly! It's not embarrassing so when guests come over, I don't have to quickly wrap it up and throw it in a closet. I just ordered the giant version to cover the whole rest of the couch. The only downside is that it's so soft, so now she wants to lay on the couch more than on her dog bed. #lifewithdogs
customer_reviews.author: Carol Morabito

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Someone wrote a review and said this wasn't waterproof and I also read that it was thin, I bought it anyway because one of my dogs is weird about peeing on their beds. Recently bought a $200 bed that was water resistant supposedly, but it wasn't , so I thought I'd give this blanket a try. Very impressed because it got peed on immediately and as you can see in the picture, the urine didn't seep through! It is also nice looking and very soft. I'll be ordering more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof. Not even a little bit.
customer_reviews.text: Not waterproof. Dog had a TINY accident and it bled COMPLETELY through to the bed comforter. I watched the accident happen and immediately pulled the cover off. It bled through in seconds. “Waterproof” is completely false advertising. Would like my money back or a TRULY waterproof product.
customer_reviews.author: Aleko

customer_reviews.title: Soft but messy looking
customer_reviews.text: This is actually a really nice blanket for people too, it's soooo soft. I keep it thrown over the bed when I'm out to protect the bedspread and thought it would blend in with the bedding but it looks messy very easily because the interior waterproof layer is very slippery and the 2 outside layers shift easily. That wouldn't be so much of a problem but the bottom layer is larger than the top so when you straighten out one edge, it pulls up the opposite side to show the underside. Kind of annoying. It's a good "throw" blanket but don't expect it to blend in nicely over your bedding or upholstery, it can't help but look messy.
customer_reviews.author: kamr

customer_reviews.title: I've not seen her ever love on something like this before
customer_reviews.text: I am so surprised by this...my dog literally loves it. I've not seen her ever love on something like this before! She stretches out on it and just has love on her face, it's crazy. This is probably one our most favorite purchases on Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: AMB

customer_reviews.title: Forget doggie duapers.......
customer_reviews.text: These are great. Saved the bedspread 4 times sinc I bought this 3 months ago. Accidents happen when you are an elderly dog (or whatever). This Sherpa Pet Blanket is soft. Washes easy and is comfy for our elderly little GoGo. If you have a large bed, order two. It’s pretty good size, but you know how bed blankets are. Great job PetAmi! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: C. Shay

customer_reviews.title: I do not think the quality is there for this ...
customer_reviews.text: I do not think the quality is there for this blanket. as also pricey for what you get.I have a cover in our truck that is three times the quality of this. I feel it is too thin. I have an 80 pound dog and wanted this for back of new vehicle. I could see him tearing it with toenails. Also, the pictures with are deceiving. They make the blanket look much thicker than what it is. Either that or they sent the wrong product.

customer_reviews.title: FINALLY - A Solution That Works!
customer_reviews.text: I have a cat that marks my couch when she sees a stray cat outside. I have spent hours cleaning the couch when this happens - and it’s tough on the couch. I tried scat mats, but she learned to mark beside them. I ordered these blankets to cover the couch. Within days, they were put to the test. NOTHING SEEPED THROUGH THE BLANKET TO THE COUCH! It worked! I used an enzyme cleaner on the blanket, threw it in the wash, and back on the couch. YEAH!!!!
customer_reviews.author: sharim22

customer_reviews.title: ... while my puppy is potty training and they are amazing. He’s only peed on them twice but it ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this to put on my living room rug while my puppy is potty training and they are amazing. He’s only peed on them twice but it kinda rolls off the blanket (the water repellent part) so I wipe it up with a towel, throw it in the wash, and the carpet underneath remains untouched! So glad I got these!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So much better than you might expect.
customer_reviews.text: We bought two of these for our senior cat who was experiencing incontinance. She snuggled in them quite a bit for warmth, and they did keep any urine from transferring to other layers of bedding. When she passed, our hounds fell in love with them. They’re great bed and furniture protectors for when they come inside as well. Be careful to follow washing instructions to maintain that waterproofing integrity.
customer_reviews.author: Toni S.

customer_reviews.title: Wet Sherpa, not wet furniture!!!
customer_reviews.text: The item is as described - appears well made. We purchased two (different colors) for various areas in the house. One advantage to these are the size (40 x 50)... manageable , covers a broad variety of items (bed, love seat, leather chair, etc.). Also, we found this much easier to wash than the large blanket from a different brand. All in all I would recommend this for quality & value.
customer_reviews.author: Nut Megd

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality & works like a charm!
customer_reviews.text: We have an older diabetic cat who unfortunately has "accidents" every so often due to her health. Up to this point we have been relying on disposable urine pads hidden under the blankets or furniture covers, but this blanket was a game changer. It has safely protected the bed 2 or 3 times now & has survived being washed as well without issue. We just bought the smaller version as a test, but will probably be buying a couple full bed sized ones very shortly.. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Stay in Place
customer_reviews.text: While soft and waterproof, it doesn't help when it slips all over and not actually large enough to cover the couch cushions without slipping off the back. The puppy when jumping on it, immediately disarrays it (there is no friction - it's too silky) and it becomes a moot point to have. Washing it is insane because I placed this in the dryer on 6 full cycles and it was still wet. I live in an apartment and cannot just hang it out to dry in the sun. Not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: JovialsOP

customer_reviews.title: So soft and cozy! My cat loves cuddling into this blanket
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my cat, it it do warm and soft, my cat lives to sleep on it. I even borrow it some times when sitting on the sofa. I love that when the weather is warmer, the other side without the sharpa is soft but not hot. Washes well in washer has a waterproof layer between, that is not crinkly when used. I would recommend this blanket!!!
customer_reviews.author: S. M. G.

customer_reviews.title: amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: The reason i bought this blanket is that my dog pee on my bed whenever i leave her alone at home so i got this because it's waterproof, i put it on the bed and she pee on it ;) it really worked!! I WOULD GIVE THIS ITEM 6 STARS IF I COULD :)
customer_reviews.author: Soheil.V

customer_reviews.title: Poooor quality
customer_reviews.text: Would give this zero stars. This is cheaply made, small and so lightweight that if it’s on the floor,!you just trip over it. Would have been better if had just bought a piece of cloth from the store. Hopefully they will refund my money.
customer_reviews.author: S. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: It's a good size and the material is very soft and durable
customer_reviews.text: My dog absolutely loves this blanket! She loves to play with it as well as sleep on it. She takes it everywhere. It's a good size and the material is very soft and durable. The waterproof feature is excellent being she had an accident on it while playing and it did not go through to our carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Esther S.

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I got these to help with my 14 year old dog's overnight incontinence. They work amazing! Nothing leaks through and they've held up to being washed almost daily since I got them almost 2 months ago. Having two large dogs who spend a lot of time outside, the white of this blanket got messy very quickly. Between that and one of our dogs having dental surgery and a little bit of blood on the blanket, I expected it to have some stains. Whatever, I got the blankets for the dogs anyway. After being washed in cold water, the stains were gone! Even when grass stains, dirt, and blood had been dried in overnight! I'm very impressed with these blankets.
customer_reviews.author: Joscelyn

customer_reviews.title: Nice blanket, will protect your bed/ sofa
customer_reviews.text: I bought four of these blankets, one for each bed. We rescue French Bulldogs, so there are a lot of dogs in the house. We have one old lady dog that sometimes pees her pants if she can’t get outside fast enough, and she’s blind so she won’t jump off the bed. This blanket has saved us from having to strip the whole bed down when she has an accident. The only annoying thing about it is that the sherpa material collects stuff and it doesn’t wash out when laundered, and it can’t go in the dryer, so that means when there is anything stuck in it, I have to pluck each bit out individually.
customer_reviews.author: ShoppingQueen

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with Seller's slow response time on how to return this item
customer_reviews.text: This blanket was made more for small dogs and I have giant breed dogs. The front and back were not stitched together so it really did not lay well. I emailed the Seller to ask how to return it TWICE and by the time they responded the window had closed for me to return it. So guess what, I can't return it. Guess I will gift it to my daughter and she can have it for her two small dogs. Beware of anything made out of the USA, but unfortunately you don't know that until it arrives at your home. VERY DISAPPOINTED and Can't Get My Money Back.
customer_reviews.author: Christi Keller

customer_reviews.title: Easily Snagged and Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: Our initial review was: “We keep our dogs nails clipped. But, they still snagged and pulled the blanket fibers. The dogs do find them comfortable. The blankets are attractive.” We would now add that, in less than a month, the blankets have fallen apart. As something you throw on the floor for the dog, these are fine. But, at this cost, we wanted to use them on the seats of the couches. But, they now look cheap and crummy—-onto the floor they go.
customer_reviews.author: S. Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Soft on one side but snags on the other
customer_reviews.text: The velux side is very soft but the sherpa side mats together and snags dry hands. Plus the sherpa side collects every possible hair, thread, fuzz, grass blade, etc. I washed it and everything is still stuck and matted into the blanket. This is problematic since it looks gross and it's supposed to be for dogs and my little Shih Tzu drags in a lot of stuff from outside since he's so close to the ground. It wouldn't dry very well either since the water got trapped in the washer in certain spots because of the water repellent material even after 2 spin cycles. Good idea but fails in execution.
customer_reviews.author: Laura G

customer_reviews.title: BEST WATERPROOF DOG BLANKET
customer_reviews.text: My 12 year old beagle sleeps on this every night ....she had a UTI which is why she had urinated on the bed during her sleep. And this worked wonders. It’s very soft and this is HER blanket lol. It washable you just airdry it- don’t put in dryer it ruins the waterproof stuff. At least that’s what directions say. Awesome purchase and would buy again. Seller was great came on a Sunday!
customer_reviews.author: Joy Muir

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING BLANKET!
customer_reviews.text: SO happy I purchased this blanket. I have a puppy and although he is paper trained, he is still a puppy and I didn't want any mishaps, when we were visiting friends/families homes. I bought it before Christmas because we were going to be visiting family. I purchased the larger size and it was perfect and covered the complete puppy play pen area. He never had an accident BUT... his water dish did end up getting knocked over. I couldn't get to the spill quick but the water just beaded up- it NEVER soaked through! Great blanket and I've had to use it a bunch of times and I've washed it just as many times and it is still awesome!!
customer_reviews.author: Ria

customer_reviews.title: Great for pet and human-kid parents!
customer_reviews.text: I own a few of these blankets. We use them to cover our couch since we have 4 dogs and 1 cat. We live in the snowy Midwest and with wet paws from outdoor playtime these blankets protect our furniture from that, and the occasional coffee/wine spill. One of our puppies did have a little accident on one when she was younger and the wetness really does bead up (on the non-Sherpa side.) If the liquid does soak into the non-Sherpa side, it doesn’t make it to the back side somehow. 10/10 would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: mplsmaven

customer_reviews.title: not even remotely waterproof
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea why they claim this blanket is waterproof, It's close to a towel in water resistance ... meaning not at all. My wet dog laid on this thing and my couch got soaked.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I got one of these for myself. Put in couch because of pups... they might not overtly wee on my light gray couch but... paws! I got the gray... it has a blue tint... very soft and pretty! I then got one for each of my my kids... 2 brown; one more gray! They are all in love with these. Awesome Xmas present! Well worth the money! Highly recommend... keeps couch clean! And... let me mention the I actually spilled some coffee on mine... it rolled right off! Maybe I got it for a dual purpose... Lololol... dogs first but possibly me too!!
customer_reviews.author: ScrappyKel

customer_reviews.title: Truly waterproof, and priced at a great value compared to others
customer_reviews.text: This is a truly waterproof cover for your couch. I recommend getting the 90"x90" size for your sofa. My cat urinated on this and it simply pooled on the surface of the cover. It is truly waterproof and won't soak through. The only complaint I have is you cannot dry it easily in the dryer without risk of damaging it. So, you have to line-dry it, if you wash it. That's a little annoying, but otherwise this is an excellent product for a great value compared to others I've seen. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Calc

customer_reviews.title: Love this for my bed!
customer_reviews.text: My cats lay on my bed all day - sometimes there are hairballs, it can't be helped lol. This now serves as my top comforter for the bed and it has been amazing to not have to change the entire bed sheets when things happen. Also it keeps the fur off my sleeping place. It's soft and they really love it, as do I. Great blanket!
customer_reviews.author: Piratekitty

customer_reviews.title: Water and mess resistant blanket
customer_reviews.text: I needed this to cover a section of the couch my dog lays on. It’s to help with hair and general wear on the couch as he likes his chew toys. This blanket is good on the eyes and doing it’s job of preventing any messes on the couch itself. I dumped a little bit of water on it to test it out and it definitely prevented the water from soaking into the couch. Now if the water was to sit on the blanket for a couple hours, would it soak through a little? Maybe, but if you’re quick to get it you’ll definitely be good.
customer_reviews.author: DC 🐧

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Actually waterproof. Tested - it’s a sure thing. Bought it to prevent puppy accidents from soaking into the bed. The sizing however, sucks. I bought the largest for my king bed, I ended up having to buy two. The large size fits the top of the bed itself... but will not hang down over the sides. When the dogs are rolling around and carrying on - the blanket moves. Hence why I ended up buying two to ensure the whole bed stays covered. Wish they made one large enough to cover the whole bed and some. Either way, two does the job.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Magically soft and water repellent
customer_reviews.text: Fortunately I haven’t had any pet “incidents” yet. It is super soft, so I was very curious how waterproof it could possibly be. I poured a cup of water on it and it beaded up like mercury! I have a weighted blanket that I would rather not have destroyed with cat urine, so I put in on top of my bed for the cats to lounge on. So far so good
customer_reviews.author: Kristin B.

customer_reviews.title: Does not stay in place
customer_reviews.text: Yes, this blanket is soft, but that's it's only good feature. Not only does that silkiness cause it to slide all over and off the sofa, but the layers slide on each other. The side with the deeper nap was originally attractive and inviting, but quickly started to look matted. While it does keep water from penetrating to the sofa, drops are not absorbed but stay pooled on the surface. I have to keep a towel handy to dry those spots from my dog's wet feel. I was using towels before I bought this blanket so I'm no further ahead.
customer_reviews.author: Sandeebar

customer_reviews.title: Best dog cover
customer_reviews.text: I am thrilled with this product, it is everything it describes and more. I have an older dog that is on occasion incontinent of urine. I have used other covers in her bed and on my leather sofa but no luck until now. Not only is this blanket esthetically pleasing to look at, it is soft and water proof. I have already washed it several times and it cleans up beautifully... Thank you PetAmi for this great product... I will be purchasing another blanket!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jude

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: My dog sometimes leaks a little when sleeping. I bought several of these blankets to put over my dog's bed and under her bed (because she sometimes sleeps on the carpet next to her bed). The urine (and smell) completely leaks through. Quite the bummer, because the blankets are really soft. I would love it if it worked. :-(
customer_reviews.author: D. Park

customer_reviews.title: Guinea pigs love it.
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for bwen on the lookout for blankets that are water proof for piggies play time. These are definitely that. The guinea pig fleece blankets are too expensive for that and found these to be sufficient. The main difference is the water will sit on top of these while guinea pig fleece will absorb it and keep the dry. I think flipping this over might have the same effect so the water seeps through the plush side. Not perfect but good for short times.
customer_reviews.author: IShopAlotonAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Ehhhh. Ok.
customer_reviews.text: Dealing with dogs, nails and playing with chew toys can ruin things. Sure, this blanket is super soft and may run water off pretty well. But the material is a bit of a disappointment due to how easily it rips and threads pop out. Pretty soon I’ll have to buy another blanket, Abdul I’ll probably choose 100% cotton.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My puppy peed on it, and this blanket saved my couch from getting peed on too.
customer_reviews.author: Vera

customer_reviews.title: Great product for spills or leaks.
customer_reviews.text: Bought another, this time the larger version. Excellent product to cover chairs or floor, soft and rich looking. The waterproof design saved our couch numerous times when our dog licks excessively or 'leaks', a quick wash and it is back in action. Will be buying another soon. I am hoping it is durable for numerous washes.
customer_reviews.author: Steve H.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best thing that's ever been invented! It's super soft and no one would have any idea it's waterproof. There's no crinkle or any sign of waterproofing material but it is totally reliable. I've had one for 10 months, washed it many times, and it's still waterproof. A few times it's had liquid on it all day while I was at work but it will not soak through to even feel dampness on the back side. I just bought a second one in case they ever stop making it I'll have an extra.
customer_reviews.author: shl

customer_reviews.title: So SOFT
customer_reviews.text: This waterproof blanket is so soft. Luckily there hasn't been any accidents on it as of yet, so I can't speak to how it will launder and react after washing it.
customer_reviews.author: Sandraelaine

customer_reviews.title: Super water absorbent
customer_reviews.text: This product worked so well that I bought two additional blankets! It is super waterproof - protecting my couches, bedding and expensive mattress. My dog loves the softness of the flannel side and the fleece side. My only wish is that it came with washing instructions. I have found good results from machine washing with gentle detergent and no fabric softener and tumble dry on low with no dryer sheets. It retains the waterproof feature despite continuous washings. Highly recommended!!!
customer_reviews.author: JKelly

customer_reviews.title: Really nice, but waterproofing isnt the best
customer_reviews.text: Very nice plush blanket. Very soft. However it is treated with a waterproof coating, not lined as I was hoping. The water pools and sits on top, and does not absorb. So pet may be laying in her accident, also pool of liquid may end up rolling along until it spills on couch/bed/floor. Also not sure if coating will wear off after washing. Really nice blanket, just not necessarily the best option for potential pet accidents.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Very soft
customer_reviews.text: My puppy pees himself in his sleep sometimes and I was always having to wash his bed cover often which is a pain because it's hard to take the filling out then back in. With this blanket I just put it ontop of his bed and it's a lot easier to wash. It does take a while to dry (I've been air drying it mostly to try to keep it as new as possible) but that's my only complaint. Havent had a leak yet so definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous.  Be sure to wash in cold and check to see whether soap is allowed. I have the red plaid.
customer_reviews.text: It cleaned easily however although I was not the person to clean it, the white side turned to pink. I hope that the person who dI'd it accidentally didn't follow cleaning instructions. ..perhaps using warm water instead of cold. The blanket did need some soap as the old cat has a weak bladder so if it was the small amt.of soap that would be disappointing. If the person accidentally washed in warm, then the blanket rates a perfect five!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa C Fountain

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality, Pups love it
customer_reviews.text: Great blanket! We have two puppies, one is 8 months the other is 3 months. One is in heat and the other is currently working on being house trained. We use this on our couch for extra protection and so far it hasn't failed us! The waterproof membrane soaks up a lot of water when you wash it, sometimes it requires an extra spin or two in the wash and extra time in the dryer. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute AND functional
customer_reviews.text: Bought for our dog who pees everywhere. Much easier to clean than her bed cover. Also easier to move around the house when she moves around to hang out with us. Very soft. Definitely needs some padding underneath if using like a bed. We are pretty quick on response to pee. So I havent noticed waterproofness. I know nothing has gone through, but I dont know if it is absorbed or just sits on top. Would buy again. Also, it's just a cute pattern.
customer_reviews.author: Raggie

customer_reviews.title: My Dog Loves It
customer_reviews.text: The one side of the blanket is really soft but the shell has that weird microfiber feeling. Other than that it’s perfect and my dog doesn’t seem to mind! He loves the blanket and it keeps me from having to wipe dirty paws off furniture all the time!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Actually works!
customer_reviews.text: We have a foster cat with bathroom issues and a husky that takes forever to dry after a swim. We purchased this blanket for the couch. The cat peed on the couch while we were away overnight. I came home today to find a pool on the blanket with NO soak through to the couch. Very, very pleased with this blanket, it saved our couch!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberlee Abrams

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT FOR INCONTINENT DOGS
customer_reviews.text: My sharpei has kidney problems and sometimes can't hold urine. It was up to a point where I had to wash her bed/blanket 3x day. The PetAmi blanket is very absorbent and when she has an accident, I know she will still be dry and it will not leak through her bed. I can fold the blanket to be re-used before washing so it lasts 2 days before having to toss in the washer (wash in cold water, no softener, tumble dry low).
customer_reviews.author: Fabianne Lima

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be what was advertised!
customer_reviews.text: We have three dogs, and purchase two of the large blankets. They certainly seem like they will do the job of protecting the furniture. Color was not quite what I expected, but sometimes it can be difficult to get a good sense of the color from an online "swatch." They are heavy and soft, the dogs like them. Still so new that I'm not ready to give a 5 star rating yet. I washed them before use, and I will say that did present a bit of a problem, in that when they were sopping wet, they became REALLY heavy, and unbalanced the load on every spin cycle. Other than that, they washed up nicely. Took a while to dry.
customer_reviews.author: Suzie-Q

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice!
customer_reviews.text: I am pleased with the quality of this blanket. It's sort and comfortable if you as a human want to actually use it. Our dog likes it. I can't attest to the water resistant qualities because of course she hasn't gotten sick since I had the blanket. My own issue is that I got the navy blue/gray combo and the blue does seem to shed a bit. I've had to take the lint roller to the comforter a couple of times. However, I haven't washed it yet - so that may solve the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Stefany

customer_reviews.title: Okay, but not great for my teething puppy
customer_reviews.text: The idea of a waterproof blanket (we let our puppy on the couch) is a great one, but as other reviewers have said, the fabric slides around (must be the in-between waterproof layer). I have this on the end part of my sectional. It fits on top, but if I were to order again, I'd go with a larger size than necessary to tuck it in on all sides. My pup likes to bite it and dig. If I could tuck it under the cushion, it'd probably work better. Also, seems very cozy - I think sometimes it's just too warm.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Great blanket that completely absorbs all urine
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful product. I have an aging dog who struggles with being able to sleep throughout the night with having accidents. Thankfully this blanket prevents me from having to strip the entire bed. I can just wash one blanket. I am so thankful to have found this product. I have now ordered a total of three blankets to use in different places throughout the house!!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney T. Bingham

customer_reviews.title: Easy care, cozy dog blanket
customer_reviews.text: The blanket is soft and cozy. It is not like a quilt in which the top and bottom are connected with a pattern of top stitching. The bottom fleece like fabric is a bit bigger and shows the fabric as an edging, as shown in the product picture. It washes and dries very nice. Cold or warm wash and low temp drier. It dries pretty fast. It’s not a heavy blanket. I bought it to protect my bed when my dog jumps up on it at night to sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Marianna W. Castellaw

customer_reviews.title: Takes all day to dry
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hoping that it would protect my comforter from my new kitten, but it doesn’t hold up to cats. It also takes longer to dry than my comforter, so that made it useless all the way around. I will say that it’s surprisingly warm and soft though, so if you’re just looking for a soft, warm throw for yourself that won’t need washing much, I would recommend it. However, if you’re using it for pets, I don’t recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: JJ12

customer_reviews.title: Good value. Lovely soft blanket.
customer_reviews.text: We use this to cover a big dog bed for a little puppy who wants to pee on the bed. It’s very soft and cushy, protects the bed, and washes well. (Note: to avoid setting pee stains/odors, wash/dry on cool. I also pretreat spots with an enzyme cleaner.) A few weeks later: now that we’re past the pee-on-the-bed phase, we still love this blanket - it’s held up to chewing and the puppy loves to nestle in it at night to sleep.
customer_reviews.author: annekohl

customer_reviews.title: Super soft, nice quality - I'm actually using it ...
customer_reviews.text: Super soft, nice quality - I'm actually using it more than my dog right now! Waterproof feature seems good - tested it w/water, but haven't washed it yet
customer_reviews.author: Mirumirukun

customer_reviews.title: Its soft and my cat likes it. It seems ...
customer_reviews.text: Its soft and my cat likes it. It seems to be waterproof so far and doesn't let odors linger. I should have read the measurements because the dog in this picture coupled with the bed makes this an absolute untrue perception of size. It's small. After you wash it, it loses its texture.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Soft but flawed.
customer_reviews.text: I really LOVE the blanket and how soft and big and cozy it is. But upon opening I have found two tears at the seams. Debating returning it but do love the feel. Wish I could give 5 stars but a new blanket with rips knocks it down a few.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Grey/Blue
customer_reviews.text: So I got the dark grey color and it's not really grey. It's more like a deep Navy. Overall I love the blanket. It's heavy but so soft. The fleece is not the best kind, anything will get caught in it, and if this is for a dog, that means leaves, twigs and what not is going to have to get pulled off at some point. I love that it's waterproof although I have not tried to flood it.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy Chainsaw

customer_reviews.title: Great Blanket!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to cur up in the blanket after I got out of the package! Make sure you keep in mind what you want to use the blanket for. I have a leather couch and the dog knows that she can only get on the couch when the blanket is on it. Keep in mind why you're buying it. I measured it out on my couch and I got exactly what I ordered; however, if I could do back, I"d get the largest blanket. I can't complain, the dog didn't order the blanket...
customer_reviews.author: GiddyUp

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: I bought this 4 months ago for my older dog who has occasional nighttime incontinence. It’s very soft and cozy. Both dogs like to lay on it. Last night she put it to the test for the first time, and not a drop went through to the bed. Totally worth it.
customer_reviews.author: DonnaF

customer_reviews.title: Really happy w/ this purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Holy cow, I wish I'd bought this earlier! After several washings it's still waterproof - we wash it on cold & then hang it to dry. I've always been skeptical that cold water wash actually does a good job cleaning anything, but every possible mess a dog can produce has come out of this blanket without a trace. Maybe the synthetic content helps with that? I'm not sure if it makes a difference in water-proofness but we spread it out on the floor with the non-sherpa side up - the dog likes the softness a lot, which is great because wherever she is, that's where the accidents are.
customer_reviews.author: kkd

customer_reviews.title: Pet waterproof blankets
customer_reviews.text: I have a few of these blankets, they are great. I have and older dog that sleeps on my bed and sometimes have accidents and with the waterproof blankets it’s not a problem. They wash nice but do not put them in the dryer.
customer_reviews.author: Marty

customer_reviews.title: The dog loves this blanket, and so do I!
customer_reviews.text: This blanket is sooooo unbelievably soft, I debated letting our new pup use it. (Thought about just keeping it for me!) I gave in and let him have it though. The blanket is surviving house training and puppy teething exceptionally well. It is indeed waterproof (he's proven it), and the waterproof layer is soft not loud and crinkly. We liked it so much, I bought another to keep in my car to protect the back seat.
customer_reviews.author: McHenryNsons

customer_reviews.title: Taking to a seamstress to finish it.
customer_reviews.text: I have not washed or tested the products barrier protection qualities, so I'm won't dock ratings on those qualities. My first observation is: Quality of material. Soft. However, the two pieces of material sewn together are only sewn on the perimeter (outer sides & edges). This blanket is not seamed or attached throughout to prevent separation while in use or in the wash. I will probably take it to a seamstress and have it finished (it would be worth spending more and purchasing a better quality if you don't want to deal with the two pieces of material separating.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Scott

customer_reviews.title: Sheds terribly
customer_reviews.text: It's soft and my dog loves it. She's incontinent so the waterproofing is great. Unfortunately, it leaves black fuzz literally everywhere. It's obnoxious.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Shea

customer_reviews.title: Color not as pictured
customer_reviews.text: I can't speak to the functionality of this blanket because I never fully took it out of it's packaging... it was soft and looked like a nice blanket; however, I ordered the "taupe" color and it was NOT as pictured... it looked more like a light gray than anything... not a pleasant color at all.
customer_reviews.author: HeatherMA

customer_reviews.title: Soft, dog resistant and comfy
customer_reviews.text: I have this in my puppy's crate that she sleeps in at night and this is incredibly soft! It is a very heavy-duty blanket and will definitely withstand anything your dog does to it, even chewing, pottying, etc. I am so pleased that I purchased this blanket and it comes in so handy! I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Codyk

customer_reviews.title: Truly Waterproof and Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Thank you for creating a lightweight blanket that saves my couch! My 12-year old female cat occasionally marks the couch despite every effort to end this behavior. This blanket is perfect for protecting my couch from cat urine and it does not leak through the blanket. Easy to wash and dry. Only issue has been the lay of the blanket, it does not lay perfectly flat. It appears to be two materials sewn together, but they are not the same exact size, so the blanket puckers and wrinkles. I also wish you had this in a large size. But I can deal with this since it protects my couch from liquids. Material is very soft and comfortable as well.
customer_reviews.author: mahalo808

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful dog blanket - easy to clean!
customer_reviews.text: I love that this blanket is machine washable. It is really soft and supportive, and is a perfect size for my golden retriever. I have used it as a car seat cover, crate pad, playtime zone, and an actual blanket to keep my pup warm. It’s beautiful and cozy and she and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Varth dader

customer_reviews.title: Worked!
customer_reviews.text: Like others have said, it's not a large blanket, but still did the job. The blanket is nice, but because of the size it's underneath another blanket on the couch. It's "caught" the dog leaking 3 times now. I'm just not sure what happens to the waterproof ability each time I wash it, but so far I'm thankful!
customer_reviews.author: KellyB

customer_reviews.title: Good product, just wish the zipper were a little different.
customer_reviews.text: I love this bed, except for one thing. It is so hard to get out of the cover to wash. If the zipper were 2 inches longer, that would have made all the difference. The zipper only goes along the end, if it came down the side just a little bit, it would be so much easier to wash.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne Troutner

customer_reviews.title: He likes it!
customer_reviews.text: I got this blanket to protect my couch and bed from my basset hound. He loves it! It is super soft! He has skin allergies and is constantly licking himself so it has been a nice barrier for my furniture from that. I can't speak to the "waterproof"-ness of it if a dog would have an accident and I haven't cleaned it yet so for now it's 5 stars across the board. Will update review if I find differently in time.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon R. Duggan

customer_reviews.title: Not Waterproof
customer_reviews.text: I bought this blanket because my cat leaks urine when sleeping. I used it on my bed and after awhile smelled cat pee. The urine had been leaking through to my bedspread. Ugh. Shame on PetAmi for false advertising.
customer_reviews.author: Charles K. Baah

customer_reviews.title: YOU NEED
customer_reviews.text: My cat was barfing on my bed and I was having to wash my sheets and comforter all the time. This is was saving me from having to wash them so frequently. My cat really like the fuzziness of the blanket and in the event of him barfing, I can wash just the blanket instead my entire bed.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Does its job and the dogs love it.
customer_reviews.text: Oddly, the review that was here was from a different product...here's the real review on the blanket. It works like a charm, protecting the dog bed from mud and whatever else comes at it. Not only that, our small dog keeps stealing the bed so I've had to order another one because the dogs like them so much.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Wasson

customer_reviews.title: Love it.  Just wish there was a larger size.
customer_reviews.text: I wish it was a little bigger so I could completely cover the bed and padded sides, but it tucks in nicely between the bed and the padding surrounding the bed. No weird odors or odd textures from the waterproof material.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really Works!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Bought one last month & back for another! They really are waterproof! Been potty training my newly rescued puppy...and these blankets are a lifesaver! (please make larger sizes!!)
customer_reviews.author: Lucy’s Wallet

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I purchased it to protect my expensive bedspread from my cats claws. I keep it over my king size bed because my cats think it's their bed not mine lol. It has a soft smooth side and a fuzzy fleecy side which the cats like. I just wish there was a larger size so it would hang over the sides of the bed. The brown is more of a red brown, wish it was more espresso chocolate so it matched my bedspread better. But I decided to keep it because it works.
customer_reviews.author: robert shoemaker

customer_reviews.title: Great blankets!!!! Makes my life so much easier!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd blanket I’ve bought. I have 3 dogs and 3 large dog beds. My 16 year old boxer/pit mix is a large dog than has severe arthritis and can’t always get up in time to go potty. The blankets make it so much easier to clean up!! Great blankets
customer_reviews.author: sharprda

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality blankets but there is no thickness to them
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality blankets but there is no thickness to them. It would appear that there is in the photo bit it is a very think blanket.
customer_reviews.author: Jill A Ort-Haskell

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome found out it worked last night. My female doesn't always wait to go outside if I am sleeping. So i put where she sleeps. And sure enough after sleeping till 8 am. And was like damn. Checked blanket under neigh and allll dry. Impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: What mud and dirt in the couch?
customer_reviews.text: So far I really like this pet blanket. It stays well on the couch, making it so the dirt and mud that comes in with the dogs can easily be swiped off and not get trapped in the couch cushions. It looks nice and feels nice. The dogs aren’t complaining. I plan on getting a few more for my other couches in time.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Great couch covers for dogs
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these to put on my couch and love seat. They have been great! They keep moitsure and dirt from seeping through, are soft, and super easy to clean. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Fur babies love it
customer_reviews.text: I have two Goldens who like to cuddle on my bed but they always leave hair and leaves etc on the quilt! Once I put this on they quickly understood that this was their area. Every day I take it off the bed and take it outside to shake it off. I wash it once a week and it looks like new!
customer_reviews.author: Sharadale

customer_reviews.title: Not totally impervious to teeth, but better than most!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs and I both love this blanket! I didn’t really buy it for the water resistance because we don’t have a problem with that. My dogs love to chew. Within a few hours I already had a hole in the soft blue side. That doesn’t bother me, I’m just SO GLAD to have found a blanket they can’t rip stuffing out of! The chew-proof layer has pretty much stopped them from chewing new holes in the blanket because they aren’t interested if they can’t rip it apart. It’s soft and warm and they love to cuddle under it. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Van Norman

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: Our beautiful Trixie girl likes to mark her territory, so that being said she peed on the blanket immediately after we put on on our new old couch. The fuzzy faux fur side soaked it right up, while the water proof side kept in contained inside the blanket. We immediately put it in the wash and she hasn't peed on it since. Will update my review once my cat makes more use of the blanket.
customer_reviews.author: Russell

customer_reviews.title: It works great and is pretty too.
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. I got it after my recuse dog had an accident on the bed. I have washed it a couple of times, I line dry it. The dog has chewed it, had two accidents, and today, he chewed open a full 12 oz pop on it. Still my bedding was saved...dry as can be. I will definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: imrjb_49509

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful blanket
customer_reviews.text: I have an older incontinent dog that sleeps on the bed and this blanket has worked out wonderfully. Completely waterproof and washes easily. Super soft and very good looking. I will be ordering more to use over the dog pillows and on the sofa. I have many dogs
customer_reviews.author: Cowdog

customer_reviews.title: Not tear proof.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product thinking my puppies would not be able to tear it apart with their teeth. I have 2 Yorkipoos, so they are not large dogs or very aggressive; however, they were still able to tear these apart with their teeth. Also, after a couple of washes, one of the mats started to come apart at the seam (one that was not by the puppies). I like the idea of these pads, but for my needs they didn't live up to my expectations. If your dogs don't tear them apart, I'm sure you will love them.
customer_reviews.author: ChristinaP

customer_reviews.title: Protects my bed while looking good
customer_reviews.text: Soft, pretty, and nice. I'm hoping this will keep dirt and hair from getting on my bed. Waterproof is not that big of a deal to me but I know it will block dirt from sifting through. Now my dogs can lay on the bed and I can have clean sheets.
customer_reviews.author: Damion Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Best blanket for a puppy or pets that frequently have accidents
customer_reviews.text: I bought this before brining home my 8 week old corgi, and she loves it. On top of that, the blankets are soft and warm, so we use the large size for the couch whether or not she’s on it! I bought a smaller size for her crate as well, and both have been very easy to clean. So far no leaks after various accidents! I’ll likely buy another large one so that when he’s on the couch, I can be warm on the loveseat lol
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I hace had this dog blanket for 3 days now and it is beginning to fall apart. The white under-end falls out to pieces and the red part starts to shed almost immediately after the first use. I have a well behaved Golden Retriever and she hasn’t nibbled it or anything. Would not recommend this product to anybody that is looking for a long-term product. This product is disposable; about 2-3 months use.
customer_reviews.author: Diego Herrera

customer_reviews.title: Loses water repellent after first wash.
customer_reviews.text: Blanket was very soft, durable, and not too noisy like other waterproof blankets. The color was beautiful too. When I first open the package and used it, the water would bead at the top for a bit before slowly soaking in. This gave me enough time to soak up the pee. After the first wash the pee just soaks through immediately, luckily the middle layer still keeps the pee from going all the way through. The top layer is also not very dog claws friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Melody H.

customer_reviews.title: Don't need it when you got it...
customer_reviews.text: We got this throw bc our chihuahua likes to mark a certain area on the couch when we are not looking. Since the throw has been on the couch, he hasn't marked anything. Strange bc he marks anything that is new. So, I haven't seen him pee on it to see if it works or not, but I'll take it. Washed right away after unpacking. Held up nice and looks decent on the couch!
customer_reviews.author: df

customer_reviews.title: Slippery
customer_reviews.text: I didn't get to test this for water resistance or ease of cleaning because the dog wouldn't get up on it. It was too slippery and would slide right off the couch I had it on. Maybe because the couch was leather? It's very soft, but very slippery.
customer_reviews.author: C. B. Theokas

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof, soft and looks nice
customer_reviews.text: I love this throw. I see others saying it isn’t waterproof but mine is. I have bought two. One for my vacation home and one for home. It has saved my bed a few times from a puppy that tinkles when she gets excited. So worth it. And it looks good and is warm and soft.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri from Scappoose

product_meta.title: PetAmi Waterproof Dog Blanket for Bed, Couch, Sofa | Waterproof Dog Bed Cover for Large Dogs, Puppies | Sherpa Fleece Pet Blanket Furniture Protector | Reversible Microfiber
feature_bullets: 100% WATERPROOF & LEAKPROOF- Perfect for your pet to lounge and nap on your sofa. Thick warm sherpa and fleece makes this waterproof pet blanket suitable for indoor and outdoor use. We have reinforced our blanket so any liquids (water or urine) will not leak from one side of the blanket to the other side of the throw. Perfect for small, medium, and large dogs, as well as cats and kittens.

PROTECTS FURNITURE/PET BEDS - Protects your furniture from scratching, chewing, fur, and shedding while keeping your pet comfortable and furniture free of fur and urine. Also great as a pet car blanket and lining for dog crates, kennels, and pet mats.

WARM AND COMFORTABLE - Equipped with sherpa lining and microfiber fleece, this blanket is reversible. This pet throw blanket features soft, plush plaid design that will keep you warm and cozy while your pet sleeps comfortably on your sofa or bed.

VERSATILE - Protect your couch, bed, and home goods from chewing, scratching, and shedding while keeping your pet dry and comfortable. Also great to help keep unwanted pet hair and fur from sofas and couches.
HIGH QUALITY & DURABLE - Made with 460 GSM premium microfiber polyester, this blanket is soft, lightweight, yet durable. It is easy to care for and MACHINE WASHABLE, tumble dry low.
